channel.title: admin on Shubham Gupta
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Shubham Gupta

item.description: Hey there! I am just another guy passionate about solving real world problems using ideas and code. Currently, I am pursuing my Masters degree in Analytics at Purdue University. My past work experience include working as software developer and application analyst. I have also been part of some really amazing organisations such as CERN, international hackathons and conferences such as MozFest. Please feel free to reach out for a detailed resume.
